item.title: My Paths Forward Policy
item.description: I am willing to spend over 1 hour per day on average having public conversations with people on the internet. You can join my discord server, connect with me on linkedin, or connect with me on facebook. I plan on building a better discussion plugin for this site instead of disqus and recommending against using disqus for now. If you ask me a publicly visible question, I will eventually respond. I will usually respond within 48 hours.
